mapper.select: SELECT member.id, member.user_id, member.name, member.email, member.address, member.tel, member.join_date, member.dept_id, member.profile_image, dept.name AS dept_name, grade.name AS grade_name FROM member JOIN dept ON dept.id = member.dept_id JOIN grade ON grade.id = member.grade_id WHERE member.user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id from member where user_id=#{user_id}
select pwd from member where user_id=#{user_id}
select user_id from member where email=#{email} and name=#{name}
select pwd from member where email=#{email} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd} where user_id=#{user_id}
